verses.verse: And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnath<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnath<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And he came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnath<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: now therefore <S%H3947>get<s%> her for me to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

Then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Is there <S%H369>never<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> among the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, or among all my <S%H5971>people<s%>, that thou <S%H1980>goest<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H3947>Get<s%> her for me; for she pleaseth me <S%H3474%H5869>well<s%>.

But his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that it was of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that he <S%H1245>sought<s%> an <S%H8385>occasion<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: for at that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%>, and his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>, to <S%H8553>Timnath<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H8553>Timnath<s%>: and, behold, a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H7580>roared<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H6743>mightily<s%> upon him, and he <S%H8156>rent<s%> him as he would have <S%H8156>rent<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%>, and he had <S%H3972>nothing<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: but he <S%H5046>told<s%> not his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> what he had <S%H6213>done<s%>.
And he went <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H802>woman<s%>; and she <S%H3474>pleased<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3474%H5869>well<s%>.

¶ And after a <S%H3117>time<s%> he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her, and he turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4658>carcase<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%>: and, behold, there was a <S%H5712>swarm<s%> of <S%H1682>bees<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> in the <S%H1472>carcase<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%>.

And he <S%H7287>took<s%> thereof in his <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and went <S%H3212>on<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%>, and <S%H1980>came<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother<s%>, and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>: but he <S%H5046>told<s%> not them that he had <S%H7287>taken<s%> the <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H1472>carcase<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%>.

¶ So his <S%H1>father<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>: and <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> there a <S%H4960>feast<s%>; for so used the young <S%H970>men<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>.
And it came to pass, when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, that they <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H4828>companions<s%> to be with him.

¶ And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I will now put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> unto you: if ye can <S%H5046>certainly<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> it me within the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4960>feast<s%>, and find it <S%H4672>out<s%>, then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>sheets<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of <S%H899>garments<s%>:

But if ye <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> it me, then shall ye <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>sheets<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of <S%H899>garments<s%>. And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Put <S%H2330>forth<s%> thy <S%H2420>riddle<s%>, that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Out of the <S%H398>eater<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3978>meat<s%>, and out of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4966>sweetness<s%>. And they <S%H3201>could<s%> not in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5046>expound<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H6601>Entice<s%> thy <S%H376>husband<s%>, that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto us the <S%H2420>riddle<s%>, lest we <S%H8313>burn<s%> thee and thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: have ye <S%H7121>called<s%> us to take that we <S%H3423>have<s%>? is it not so?

And <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> before him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou dost but <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and <S%H157>lovest<s%> me not: thou hast put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and hast not <S%H5046>told<s%> it me. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Behold, I have not <S%H5046>told<s%> it my <S%H1>father<s%> nor my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and shall I <S%H5046>tell<s%> it thee?

And she <S%H1058>wept<s%> before him the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, while their <S%H4960>feast<s%> <S%H1961>lasted<s%>: and it came to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that he <S%H5046>told<s%> her, because she lay <S%H6693>sore<s%> upon him: and she <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of her <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> before the <S%H2775>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down<s%>, What is <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> than <S%H1706>honey<s%>? and what is <S%H5794>stronger<s%> than a <S%H738>lion<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3884>If<s%> ye had not <S%H2790>plowed<s%> with my <S%H5697>heifer<s%>, ye had not found <S%H4672>out<s%> my <S%H2420>riddle<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> upon him, and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H2488>spoil<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of garments unto them which <S%H5046>expounded<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%>. And his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>, and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
But <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> was given to his <S%H4828>companion<s%>, whom he had used as his <S%H7462>friend<s%>.
